statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo ''); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); context_info=$(printf ' [%d%% ctx]' "$pct"); else context_info=''; fi; if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf '%s (%s) [%s]%s' "$(basename "$cwd")" "$model" "$branch" "$context_info"; else printf '%s (%s)%s' "$(basename "$cwd")" "$model" "$context_info"; fi
